name: Windows Addon Archive
summary: Learn about .WA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To integrate a WA addon file, double-click "AIO Integrator" from the Tools Manager, select "Add Addons," and choose your WA file(s).

NOTE: In order to use WA files, you have to download the Win Toolkit, which is able to integrate addons, drivers, updates, gadgets, language packs, theme packs, and registry tweaks to customize your Windows installation disk.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
